articles.author: Emily Peck
articles.title: In DOGE effort to combat fraud, Social Security's core mission is at stake - Axios
articles.description: The system provides critical benefits to more than 74 million Americans.
articles.content: The Trump administration's drive to eradicate a small amount of fraud in Social Security is risking the agency's longstanding mission to serve the public, current and former Social Security Administr… [+4430 chars]
